title: Trapping of thermally generated ortho- and para-quinone methides by imidazoles and pyrazoles: a simple route to green synthesis of benzopyrone-azole hybrids and their evaluation as α-glucosidase inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27809-27815
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05230G, Paper
Open Access

Andrii S. Myshko, Galyna P. Mrug, Svitlana P. Bondarenko, Kostyantyn M. Kondratyuk, Oleksandr L. Kobzar, Vladyslav M. Buldenko, Andriy V. Kozytskiy, Andriy I. Vovk, Mykhaylo S. Frasinyuk
We demonstrate a protocol for the synthesis of benzopyrone-azole hybrids in the reaction of pyrazoles and (benz)imidazole with phenolic Mannich bases. The target compounds were studied as inhibitors of α-glucosidase.
